snippet.title: Robo Rapture Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Robo Rapture Releases December 8th on itch.io for free!
https://itsthemaceo.itch.io/

Robo Rapture is a turn-based strategy game with endless runner elements. Taking place in the not so far future where the rapture has come taking everything with a soul to heaven or hell, you play as three soulless giant robots desperately trying to survive the endless onslaught of demons as you work to slay the Antichrist himself, Neo-Satan!

Robo Rapture was developed as a final project for Vancouver Film School.
